类型: Style: 0 - Beautiful girl, you can do amazing things
评论详情: The individual I was buying this for really needs to know how amazing she is, and this seemed like a great way to remind her.  It is cute, great price, the selection of phrases is epic, the band has some give making it good for a wide range of sizes.  I was given one of these for Mother's Day last year and it still has not tarnished, as well as I can still read message inside and out.  Mine is also lightweight and fairly comfortable.  My ONLY complaint is that I am always afraid it is going to fall off my wrist!  I find myself constantly bending it closer to my wrist.  On the upside, it still hasn't broken or stretched larger!  I would definitely buy again!

类型: Style: Keep going - Sun & Moon
评论详情: I absolutely love this bracelet! I loved it in the listing, but once it arrived it exceeded my expectations. The bracelet looks and feels very high quality. The metal is heavy, and not light/cheap feeling. Comes with a cloth to wipe away fingerprints. The pattern is beautiful and has no visible imperfections. The messages you can choose from are all inspiring and motivational. Font is beautiful script, and very readable. I ordered this for a family member who struggles with mental health, and i think it'll be a great little "pick-me-up" during her day to look down and see this on her wrist knowing what the inside message says. Size works great on my wrist, and seems to be customizable (squeeze it together of you need it tighter). Highly recommend this product! Absolutely LOVE!
